title: Tina entertained by bouncing bunny puppet

content.prompt: Tina’s mother often entertains Tina by bouncing a bunny puppet back and forth along the side of Tina’s crib. Initially, Tina pays close attention to the puppet but after a while, she begins to ignore it and continues doing what she was doing before the puppet appeared. Which of the following psychological concepts best explains Tina’s change in behavior?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
